artist: Artist: Audrey Flack; Publisher: Democratic National Committee, Washington, D.C.
creditline: Vermillion Archival Colleciton, Gift of The Northern Star Foundation and The Fiduciary Fund
description: From a suite of six prints by six American artists, produced as a fund-raiser for the re-election campaign of President Jimmy Carter. The other prints were by Ansel Adams, Romare Bearden, Sam Francis, Robert Indiana, and Wayne Thiebaud. Flack's was the only work in the portfolio printed at Vermillion.
inscription: Signed, numbered, titled, and chop mark.
signed:
LR: [Audrey Flack]
LR: [P.P. 2/10]
LL: [Banana Split Sundae]
title: Banana Split Sundae
